# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
"""
@File        : base.py
@Author      : liuda
@Time        : 2022/1/20 13:42
@Description : 基础模型抽象类

from django.db import models



[文档]class BaseModel(models.Model):

    created_at = models.DateTimeField(
        auto_now_add=True,
        verbose_name="数据创建时间"
    )
    updated_at = models.DateTimeField(
        auto_now=True,
        verbose_name="更新时间"
    )


[文档]    class Meta:
        abstract = True




[文档]class NameAndDescNameModel(models.Model):
    """抽象类"""
    desc_name = models.CharField(
        max_length=200,
        verbose_name="中文名字",
    )
    name = models.CharField(
        max_length=200,
        verbose_name="英文代码",
    )
    created_at = models.DateTimeField(
        auto_now_add=True,
        verbose_name="创建时间"
    )


[文档]    class Meta:
        abstract = True
